EmailTemplate.name: SERI - Notify Role Changes Propagation
EmailTemplate.Body:
Following recent changes in IT Security administration, your access rights were automatically updated to reflect these changes. You can find the technical details below

Your Profile Details
  • Full Name: $identityName
  • Employee ID: $userId

#foreach ($pPlan in $project.getPlans()) #foreach ($acctReq in $pPlan.getAccountRequests()) #if ($acctReq.getApplication() != "IIQ") Application: $acctReq.getApplication(). Account ID: $acctReq.getNativeIdentity() #foreach ($attrReq in $acctReq.getAttributeRequests())
  • Operation: $attrReq.getOperation()
  • Attribute: $attrReq.getName()
  • Value(s): $attrReq.getValue()
#end #end #end #end
Regards,
The IdentityIQ Administration Team
EmailTemplate.Description: This EmailTemplate is used to notify end users about propagation of role changes to their profile
EmailTemplate.Subject: Automatic Changes of Entitlements for $firstName $lastName - End User Notification
